Text:
I bought this CD used in 1997 for like $8.  Today I saw people selling it on amazon.com from $40 - $117. 

It's a classic, but that's just a rip off.  So here it is.
If anyone can put up a FLAC version of Second Toughest of the Infants, that'd be tight.

Thank u very much 4 this torrent!!
Excellent quality tracks

This Torrent includes the soundtrack at the end of TRAINSPOTTING!
